div.div: Univ. of St. Thomas vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: St. Thomas wins the toss and defers, SJU receives.
Griffin Snyder kickoff 70 yards to the SJU00, Rob Voshell return 14 yards to the SJU14, (Steve Dejewski).
Stephen Johnson rush for 3 yards to the SJU17, (Harry Pitera).
Connor Bruns pass incomplete to Taylor Freetly.
Connor Bruns pass incomplete to Josh Bungum.
Nick Martin punt 41 yards to the UST42, Jack Gilliland return 25 yards to the SJU33, (Nick Martin).
